text: Masthead of Der Komunist''Der Komunist (, 'The Communist') was a Yiddish language newspaper published from Kharkov, Ukraine 1920–1922. In the midst of the Russian Civil War, Der Komunist was printed on blue wrapping paper (normally used for packing sugar). By March 1921 it was estimated to have had a circulation of 2,000. ==References== Category:Mass media in Kharkiv Category:Newspapers published in Ukraine Category:Publications established in 1920 Category:Publications disestablished in 1922 Category:Yiddish communist newspapers
title: Der Komunist (Kharkov)
